description: Adds media streams to an existing flow. After you add a media stream to a flow, you can associate it with a source and/or an output that uses the ST 2110 JPEG XS or CDI protocol.

parameters.name: FlowArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the flow.

parameters.name: MediaStreams
parameters.description: The media streams that you want to add to the flow. (dict) --- The media stream that you want to add to the flow. Attributes (dict) --- The attributes that you want to assign to the new media stream. Fmtp (dict) --- The settings that you want to use to define the media stream. ChannelOrder (string) --- The format of the audio channel. Colorimetry (string) --- The format that is used for the representation of color. ExactFramerate (string) --- The frame rate for the video stream, in frames/second. For example: 60000/1001. If you specify a whole number, MediaConnect uses a ratio of N/1. For example, if you specify 60, MediaConnect uses 60/1 as the exactFramerate. Par (string) --- The pixel aspect ratio (PAR) of the video. Range (string) --- The encoding range of the video. ScanMode (string) --- The type of compression that was used to smooth the video's appearance. Tcs (string) --- The transfer characteristic system (TCS) that is used in the video. Lang (string) --- The audio language, in a format that is recognized by the receiver. ClockRate (integer) --- The sample rate (in Hz) for the stream. If the media stream type is video or ancillary data, set this value to 90000. If the media stream type is audio, set this value to either 48000 or 96000. Description (string) --- A description that can help you quickly identify what your media stream is used for. A unique identifier for the media stream. A name that helps you distinguish one media stream from another. The type of media stream. VideoFormat (string) --- The resolution of the video.

nested_params.name: Attributes
nested_params.description: The attributes that you want to assign to the new media stream.

nested_params.name: Fmtp
nested_params.description: The settings that you want to use to define the media stream.

nested_params.description: The frame rate for the video stream, in frames/second. For example: 60000/1001. If you specify a whole number, MediaConnect uses a ratio of N/1. For example, if you specify 60, MediaConnect uses 60/1 as the exactFramerate.

nested_params.name: Tcs

nested_params.name: Lang

nested_params.name: ClockRate
nested_params.description: The sample rate (in Hz) for the stream. If the media stream type is video or ancillary data, set this value to 90000. If the media stream type is audio, set this value to either 48000 or 96000.

nested_params.name: Description
nested_params.description: A description that can help you quickly identify what your media stream is used for.

nested_items.name: FlowArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the flow that you added media streams to.

nested_items.name: MediaStreams
nested_items.description: The media streams that you added to the flow.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: Attributes that are related to the media stream.

nested_items.name: ChannelOrder
nested_items.description: The format of the audio channel.

nested_items.name: Colorimetry
nested_items.description: The format used for the representation of color.

nested_items.name: ExactFramerate
nested_items.description: The frame rate for the video stream, in frames/second. For example: 60000/1001.

nested_items.name: Par
nested_items.description: The pixel aspect ratio (PAR) of the video.

nested_items.name: Range
nested_items.description: The encoding range of the video.

nested_items.name: ScanMode
nested_items.description: The type of compression that was used to smooth the video's appearance.

nested_items.name: Tcs
nested_items.description: The transfer characteristic system (TCS) that is used in the video.

nested_items.name: Lang
nested_items.description: The audio language, in a format that is recognized by the receiver.

nested_items.name: ClockRate
nested_items.description: The sample rate for the stream. This value is measured in Hz.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description that can help you quickly identify what your media stream is used for.

nested_items.name: Fmt
nested_items.description: The format type number (sometimes referred to as RTP payload type) of the media stream. MediaConnect assigns this value to the media stream. For ST 2110 JPEG XS outputs, you need to provide this value to the receiver.

nested_items.name: MediaStreamId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the media stream.

nested_items.name: MediaStreamName
nested_items.description: A name that helps you distinguish one media stream from another.
